  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -H 'sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0' \
  --data-raw '{"convoName":"New Data Room","sessionId":"6867c22322c71d30bd10bb96"}'


  ## API Spec
  Add Convo To Bot
Creates a new active bot if it doesn't exist and adds a new dataroom / conversation to that active bot.

This endpoint accepts both bot_id of a pre-defined bot and an active bot. In the case of a pre-defined bot, an active bot linked to this pre-defined bot will be fetched or created, and then used to link with the new data room.

The new data room is attached to the active bot, regardless.

Authorizations:
HTTPBearer
path Parameters
bot_id
required
string (Bot Id)
Request Body schema: application/json
convoName
Convoname (string) or Convoname (null) (Convoname)
defaultLanguage
Defaultlanguage (string) or Defaultlanguage (null) (Defaultlanguage)
Default: "English"
sessionId
Sessionid (string) or Sessionid (null) (Sessionid)
isDefaultConvoName
Isdefaultconvoname (boolean) or Isdefaultconvoname (null) (Isdefaultconvoname)
Default: true
